rows.label: tlk70000069_04_msg0001
rows.name:
If it isn't the heroes! How's
life been treating you?

rows.label: tlk70000069_04_msg0002
rows.name:
What? Of course I mean that you guys
are the heroes. See anyone else I'd
be talking about round here?

rows.label: tlk70000069_04_msg0003
rows.name:
There's nothing a capable group of
Drivers and Blades can't fix. At least,
that's what people have been saying.

rows.label: tlk70000069_04_msg0004
rows.name:
As a lone adventurer, I'm not exactly
on the cutting edge of gossip. So it
says something if even I hear rumors.

rows.label: tlk70000069_04_msg0005
rows.name:
People are counting on you. That
must be a nice feeling. Being called
heroes can't hurt either, huh?
